EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Your NCS information pack: final steps and need-to-knows
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for agreeing for {!Contact.FirstName} to come to the first day of NCS on {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} with their bags packed and ready to take a place if one becomes available!
Although {!Contact.FirstName} is still on the waiting list, each year some people can’t attend at short notice. If a place doesn’t become available for {!Contact.FirstName} and they end up going home, we’ll give them a shopping voucher and you can have a refund.
Meanwhile, to prepare for NCS, please read this pack carefully. There’s lots of important information here, including:
- Your NCS Timetable – shows meeting points, dates, times, and accommodation for the residential parts. You will need to organise {!Contact.FirstName}’s transport to all the meeting points and from the return points if {!Contact.FirstName} gets a place. Click here to see this: {!Wave__c.Programme_Pack_Letters__c} - Your NCS Information Booklet – gives you essential information about NCS, including packing lists and how to contact us in an emergency. Click here to see this: {!Wave__c.Programme_booklet__c}
As {!Contact.FirstName}’s parent or guardian, there are two important things you need to do before {!Contact.FirstName} turns up on the first day of NCS:
1. Please contact us to make sure we have a correct emergency phone number for you. It’s your responsibility to make sure we have a correct number and someone will be available to take calls on it.
2. Please contact us if there have been any changes to the medical, support or dietary information you gave us about {!Contact.FirstName}, or if you need to give us any other details. You’re responsible for making sure we have full and up-to-date medical, support and dietary information, including details of any medication*.
You can call us on 0203 542 2400 or email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org if you have any questions or need to give us any information. Please quote {!Contact.FirstName}’s NCS ID number: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c}.
If {!Contact.FirstName} can no longer attend NCS, please contact us.
We’re really looking forward to seeing {!Contact.FirstName} on {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} and we do hope they get a place!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
* As standard, The Challenge does not accept responsibility for any medication that a young person brings on NCS. This includes administering medication. Please see our consent statement for more information. If there needs to be an exception for the young person or if you have any concerns, please contact us.
